{"template": [MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos=(23,8), size=(45,45), png=5), MultiContentEntryText(pos=(105,0), size=(1048,60), flags=RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text=0), ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular",27)], "itemHeight":60}

screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet: # this should be factored out into some helper code,but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize,ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() # y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 110,textsize[1] + 110) offset=40 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 100 wsizex = textsize[0] + 180 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (800 > wsizex): wsizex = 800 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey) # resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) # resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) # move list listsize = (wsizex - 20, 90) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) # center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth) / 2, (1080 - wsizey) / 2))

screen.name: Toast
screen.title: Message
screen.applet: # this should be factored out into some helper code,but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize,ePoint orgwidth=self.instance.size().width() orgpos=self.instance.position() textsize=self["text"].getSize() # y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize=(textsize[0] + 110,textsize[1] + 80) offset=0 wsizex=textsize[0] + 40 wsizey=textsize[1] + offset if (800 > wsizex): wsizex=800 wsize=(wsizex,wsizey) # resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) # resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) # center window newwidth=wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2,orgpos.y()))
